description: This is a React functional component for a Skills management page, allowing admin users to create, update, and delete skill entries, with features like grouping skills by categories, form handling, and API interactions.

methods.name: emptySkill()
methods.description: Initializes a new skill object with default values.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of skills from the API and updates state.

methods.name: startCreate
methods.description: Prepares the form for creating a new skill.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Loads an existing skill into the form for editing.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission for creating or updating a skill.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a skill after user confirmation.
